But once Gatsby moves into his new villa and makes his moves on Betty Field, the film gets overly melodramatic.
The dialogue is four-letter-word disgusting throughout, and the flick offers no let-up from its barrage of violence and stupidity.
Truly a thrill ride of Epic proportions, I would recommend "The Gamers: Dorkness Rising" as required viewing for anyone who loves film.
